name: WithoutMeaning
description:
WithoutMeaning - it's an RPG with elements of survival and finding a job. For this moment the game has a base narrative and some game mechanics. Project create within 48 hours in Ingame game jam. Theme of the jam is "finding a job and close vacation". We hope you enjoy this project and see the problems that we show you about our world.

Team:

AmaruTrai - game developer

Grin_Danilov - sound designer

Ernst Studio(ErnstGames) - game developer

Mordragon - game-designer (system & narrative), writer, project manager.

Dmitry Hodakov - 2D-artist

ShriGanapati - game-designer
